title: Linux: Create and Connect to an NFS Share
author: Jack Wallen
description: If you need faster copy and write speeds than you're finding with Samba, NFS is a great option. Just remember that NFS isn't quite as flexible as Samba.
cntitle: Linux：创建和连接 NFS 共享
cndescription: 如果您需要比 Samba 更快的复制和写入速度，NFS 是一个不错的选择。请记住，NFS 不如 Samba 灵活。
